What is Get Mastered?

Get Mastered is an audio improvement and mastering service run by professional mastering engineers, and the only service of its kind that provides musicians and engineers of all levels a chance to grow their production skills through Mix Feedback from a personal engineer. Below is just one example of the difference we can make to your music through our collaborative mastering process:

BEFORE:

AFTER:


Our mastering engineers strive to make your audio the absolute best it can be, at rates that are the absolute best value for your dollar. Just read reviews from our happy customers, listen to some more examples of our work and get started today with your first song free!



Our Mastering Rates


In addition to your first master free, we give our clients another free master credit with every three paid masters, just for sticking with us. Plus, our affordable rates get you the absolute best value for your dollar.

With Get Mastered, you don't just get a master; you get a personal mastering engineer who will work with you to make your music the best it can be. In addition to making your tracks louder, your albums cohesive, and your songs ready for commercial release, our engineers take pride in artistically enhancing your track in a way that reflects your style. Your engineer at Get Mastered will get to know your tastes, and get you closer to the sounds and artists you admire.

Our turnaround times are absolute maximums; we often return masters earlier than our listed turnaround times. That being said, we don't rush quality. If you absolutely need a rush job, let your engineer know; we are happy to work with you to the best of our abilities at no extra cost.

Calculate your price

Our Memberships


Do you want your mastering engineer with you every step of the way? Mix Feedback, available on any level membership plan, gives you access to your mastering engineer when you want help with a mix that isn't quite sounding as great as you'd like.

Mix Feedback goes a little something like this: you send us a mix, and we recommend solutions to any issues you might be unhappy with. For example, if your vocal compression seems a little off, we can suggest control values on a specific compressor plug-in you might be using. Your mastering engineer will also tailor this advice to your skill level, so don't worry about feeling patronized (or jargon-ized).

In addition to your monthly Mix Feedbacks, we give our members complimentary Mix Feedback for anything you have your engineer master. Examples of mix feedback are coming to our website soon.

Our Memberships


Do you want your mastering engineer with you every step of the way? Mix Feedback, available on any level membership plan, gives you access to your mastering engineer when you want help with a mix that isn't quite sounding as great as you'd like.

Mix Feedback goes a little something like this: you send us a mix, and we recommend solutions to any issues we hear. For example, if your vocal compression seems a little off, we can suggest control values on a specific compressor plug-in you might be using. Your mastering engineer will also tailor this advice to your skill level, so don't worry about feeling patronized (or jargon-ized).

Our members get Mix Feedback free with every master, so that we can identify and fix any mix-level issues before we master your track. Each tier also includes a certain amount of Mix Feedbacks monthly, which you can use for help during your recording and mixing process when things aren't sounding quite right.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is mastering?


To many, mastering is simply adding volume to a track. Not to us! Our mission is to make your music sound like the artists and producers you admire, plain and simple. We get to know your tastes, and enhance your song to have the tone, style, volume, cohesion, and quality of the music you love. Plus, we offer revisions free of charge to make sure you are absolutely satisfied with your master.

Listen yourself to some of our previous work from happy customers!

What is mix feedback?


Of course, creating the perfect track doesn't start at the mastering level. We know our customers want to learn how to mix and record like the pros, and that is why we offer mix feedback. Regardless of your skill level as a producer, there is nothing more vital to growth than receiving feedback on your work from experienced ears. We tailor our feedback to your skill level, and offer recommended recording and mixing solutions with every mix feedback.

We include personalized mix feedback with your first free master to give you an idea of what you can expect.

What about non-musical audio?


Our engineers also have experience with non-musical work, including podcasts. We do anything and everything audio! Due to the differences in the nature of these works, we have custom rates for non-musical audio projects. Reach out to us with some details about your project, or contact your engineer directly for special rates on non-musical projects.

Have another question? Email your mastering engineer, or email us directly at services@getmastered.com
